title: The Holographic Universe {docx & PDF}
description:
Title:			The Holographic Universe

Author:			Michael Talbot


Subjects:		Science, physics, metaphysics, mysticism, philosophy


Publisher:		HarperCollins
Publication Date:	April, 1991
ISBN:			0-06-016381-X	
# of pages:		331


Format:			Word Document, +PDF

About the book:	
		

			Michael Talbot's "The Holographic Universe" elaborates on the idea that the universe is basically a hologram. To support this theory Talbot sites many studies of physics, mysticism, metaphysics, and even describes some of his own personal experiences which are relevant to the topic. I came across this book in a thrift store and could not put it down until I was finished. This book is extremely interesting and is a must-read for anyone with any mild interest in the forementioned subjects. Read with an open mind as Michael Talbot attempts to explain his understanding of reality and existence!
